name: A Balanced World
description:
You control the Reincarnation Lotus, that captures souls rising from your world. For each soul that you capture, two people will be born, and the population of your world will increase. As time goers by, more and more souls will end up in the upper world where they will live forever.

Goal:

Catch as much souls as you can before your world reach a balance.

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right Arrows
R to replay

This game was made in 3.5 hours, for the Trijam 72. It was inspired by ancestral representations of the universe from various civilizations or religions such as the Vikings, the Hurons, the Dogons or the Mahayana.

Pour les francophones, n'hésitez pas à aller lire une nouvelle sur ce jeu !
